name: flood-data
description: Serverless (AWS Lambda) project for flood data processing

scripts.integration-test: lab test/integration -v -r console -o stdout -r junit -o test/output-integration.xml -m 60000
scripts.migrate:u_flood:create-table: docker cp test/data/sql-scripts/u_flood.sql postgis:/ && docker exec -it postgis psql -U postgres -d flooddev -f /u_flood.sql
scripts.migrate:create-view: docker cp test/data/sql-scripts/views.sql postgis:/ && docker exec -it postgis psql -U postgres -d flooddev -f /views.sql
scripts.migrate:create-data: docker cp test/data/sql-scripts/data.sql postgis:/ && docker exec -it postgis psql -U postgres -d flooddev -f /data.sql
scripts.migrate:insert: docker cp test/data/sql-scripts/u_flood-insert.sql postgis:/ && docker exec -it postgis psql -U postgres -d flooddev -f /u_flood-insert.sql
scripts.migrate:delete: docker cp test/data/sql-scripts/migration-delete.sql postgis:/ && docker exec -it postgis psql -U postgres -d flooddev -f /migration-delete.sql
scripts.migrate:tests: npm run migrate:u_flood:create-table && npm run migrate:create-view && npm run migrate:create-data && npm run migrate:insert
scripts.unit-test: lab test/unit -c -r console -o stdout -r lcov -o coverage/lcov.info -r junit -o test/output-unit.xml
scripts.post-deployment-test: npm run migrate:tests && npm run integration-test
scripts.pre-deployment-test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test

author: DEFRA
